privacy.metaDescription: Information on how Gearbnb processes your personal data.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.controllerText: The data controller is the operator of the Gearbnb platform. For any question about this policy you can contact us at the email address indicated in your account area or on the website.
privacy.dataText: We process the data that you provide to create and manage your account (such as name, email, password), data relating to your equipment and bookings, payment-related information processed through our payment providers, basic technical data such as IP address and browser information, and usage data necessary to keep the service secure and to prevent abuse.
privacy.purposesAccount: Creation and management of your account and authentication to the platform.
privacy.purposesBookings: Management of bookings, communications between users, and related contractual and pre-contractual obligations.
privacy.purposesSecurity: Security of the platform, prevention of fraud and abuse, and compliance with legal obligations.
privacy.purposesCommunication: Sending service communications strictly necessary for the use of the platform (for example, confirmations and updates on bookings).
privacy.legalBasisText: We process your data because it is necessary for the performance of a contract to which you are a party or in order to take steps at your request prior to entering into a contract, to comply with legal obligations, and, where applicable, on the basis of our legitimate interest in keeping the service secure and improving it.
privacy.retentionText: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active and, subsequently, for the time necessary to comply with legal obligations or to protect our rights. Certain booking-related data may be retained for longer periods as required by applicable law.
privacy.rightAccess: Right of access to your personal data.
privacy.rightRectification: Right to request the rectification of inaccurate or incomplete data.
privacy.rightErasure: Right to request the erasure of your data in the cases provided for by law.
privacy.rightRestriction: Right to request restriction of processing in the cases provided for by law.
privacy.rightPortability: Right to receive your data in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format, where applicable.
privacy.rightObject: Right to object to processing based on our legitimate interest, on grounds relating to your particular situation.
privacy.contactText: To exercise your rights or for any question regarding this policy, you can contact us using the contact details indicated on the website.
privacy.disclaimer: This text is provided for general information purposes only and does not constitute legal advice. Please consult your legal advisor to adapt this policy to your specific situation and applicable law.

cookies.metaDescription: Information on how Gearbnb uses cookies and similar technologies.
cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.text: We use technical cookies necessary for the operation of the site and, where enabled, cookies to understand how the platform is used and improve our services. You can accept or reject non-essential cookies at any time.
cookies.whatAreCookiesText: Cookies are small text files that the sites visited by the user send to the browser, where they are stored to be then retransmitted to the same sites on the next visit. They can be used for technical, functional or analytical purposes.
cookies.typesTitle: Types of cookies we may use
cookies.necessary: Necessary cookies: required to provide the basic functions of the site and ensure security.
cookies.functional: Functional cookies: improve the browsing experience and allow certain preferences to be saved.
cookies.analytics: Analytics cookies: help us understand how the platform is used and which pages are most visited, in aggregate and anonymous form where possible.
cookies.managementText: You can manage your cookie preferences directly from this banner and through your browser settings, where you can block or delete cookies. Please note that disabling certain cookies may impact the proper functioning of the site.
cookies.changesText: We may update this cookie policy over time. We invite you to consult it periodically to stay informed about how we use cookies.
cookies.disclaimer: This text is for general information only and does not constitute legal advice. Please consult your legal advisor to adapt this policy to your specific situation and applicable law.
